alert.note: Alert for Decatur; Grady (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 2:12PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Gadsden, Leon, southeastern Decatur and southern Grady Counties through 300 PM EDT... At 212 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles south of Bainbridge to near Quincy. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 40 to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Midway, Quincy, Tallahassee, Havana, Cairo, Woodville, Whigham, Greensboro, Florida State University, Florida A And M, Tallahassee Comm College, Doak Campbell Stadium, Gretna, Attapulgus, Lake Bradford, Juniper, Douglas City, Gaither Community Center, Tallahassee Memorial Hosp and Florence. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
